Usage: git-ws dep set [OPTIONS] DEP {name|remote|sub_url|url|revision|path|man
                      ifest_path|groups|with_groups|submodules|symlinks} VALUE

  Set ATTRIBUTE For Dependency DEP to VALUE.

Options:
  -M, --manifest FILE  Manifest file. 'git-ws.toml' by default.
  -h, --help           Show this message and exit.
